title: NFL tweets highlight video of Brady's five Super Bowls
text:
by Joshua Schrock   5:44PM 15,853 Tweet 
Tom Brady cemented his legacy as the greatest quarterback to play the game when the   completed a historic comeback against   Super Bowl LI.
